name: Bubble Challenge Squirrel Play
description:
Clear the bubbles on the screen and get the treasure to level up, and try to get 3 stars on each level.

How to play:
1.Tap where you want the bubble.
2.To group 3 or more bubbles to make them burst.
3.Get the treasure pass the level.
Features:
- Many different and challenging levels.
- Special boosters & bubbles to help you pass those tricky levels
- Free & easy to play, challenging to master!
